short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read Paywalled articles, Pay with Bitcoin on Lightning Network

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension opens the current tab URL with Kriptode's Brick Break service so you can read paywalled articles by paying with Bitcoin via Lightning Network.
